010package imagingbook.pub.corners;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013import java.util.Locale;
014
015import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
016
017
018/**
019 * This class represents a 2D corner.
020 * A corner is essentially a {@link Pnt2d} plus a scalar quantity
021 * {@link #q} for the corner strength.
022 * 
023 * @version 2020/10/02
024 */
025public class Corner implements Pnt2d, Comparable<Corner> {
026        
027        private final float x, y;
028        private final float q;
029
030        public Corner(float x, float y, float q) {
031                this.x = x;
032                this.y = y;
033                this.q = q;
034        }
035        
036        @Override
037        public double getX() {
038                return x;
039        }
040
041        @Override
042        public double getY() {
043                return y;
044        }
045
046        public double getQ() {
047                return q;
048        }
049
050        // used for sorting corners by corner strength q
051        @Override
052        public int compareTo(Corner other) {
053                return Float.compare(other.q, this.q);
054        }
055        
056        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
057        
058        @Override
059        public String toString() {
060                return String.format(Locale.US, "Corner <%.3f, %.3f, %.3f>", x, y, q);
061        }
062        
063        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
064        
065        public static void main(String[] args) {
066                Corner c1 = new Corner(1,0,1);
067                Corner c2 = new Corner(2,0,2);
068                Corner c3 = new Corner(3,0,3);
069                Corner c4 = new Corner(4,0,2);
070                
071                Corner[] corners = {c1, c2, c3, c4};
072                System.out.println("corners orig =   " + Arrays.toString(corners));
073                
074                Arrays.sort(corners);
075                System.out.println("corners sorted = " + Arrays.toString(corners));
076        }
077}
078
